title: Percezioni persistenti
description: Lyric and satiric poetry. Every age has its own models, in the information age the author-actor appears to readers-viewers with the exaltation of autobiography exasperated so canceling just apparently the universality of the message because egotism, the cult of self and self-congratulation are all popular characters in a contemporary society in progressive dissolution.Free download at Emiliano Balistreri's profile on Academia.edu website.
author: Emiliano Balistreri
